metadata.Title: CVE-2016-1000031 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: Apache Commons FileUpload before 1.3.3 DiskFileItem File Manipulation Remote Code Execution

notes.Note: sbeattie> embedded code copy in tomcat, need to verify is being used mdeslaur> Apache's response is "does not represent a vulnerability in Apache Commons FileUpload". This needs to be handled in applications using the library.

criterions.comment: libcommons-fileupload-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
tomcat6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
tomcat7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
tomcat8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
